message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm confident it will be equally valuable to you, if not more.  I'm offering it to you for $1500000.  This is a price that reflects the potential value I see in this product.  Let me know if you're interested in learning more.
